Name: 休闲游戏合集
About the game: The game includes a free DLC, which you can obtain in the following ways. DLC is available free of charge as follows: Method one: click on the link , after opening a point on the right side of 'install option' button. Method 2: Press the key combination 'Win + R' to enter STEAM and hit enter. Method 3: press the key combination 'Win + R' input: steam: / / rungameid / 1483520, hit return. Goldfinger for all games: press Alt + CTRl +K to complete the game with one key Welcome to chat room or Q group for the latest news Official steam chat room: key combination Win + R, input: steam ， Enter Official Q group number:717417622 Introduction to the game Breaking the rules and seeking for change, the leisure games collection is the first new attempt of the philosophy group. We select famous old leisure games to match with lovely beauties to help us spend the empty and lonely time. The final form of the game is 6-in-1 Every period of time to update a game, and no price increase, follow-up games will be based on the feedback of players to make and optimize, the first time to meet the needs of all friends. The first one is: Zuma, a beautiful girl The second paragraph is: treatment of major operations The third section is expected to be: security of female dormitory (under production) DLC Features: [/] Pretty Girl Zuma -10 characters 10 sets of static exquisite wallpaper - 10 interactive scenes Heal big Battle - 10 characters - 10 role gifs - 20 dynamic scenarios
